post.text:
We need to build an inclusive economy that helps everyone get ahead, including Americans with disabilities. Learn more about Hillary's plan, live from Orlando.

For live closed captioning, watch Hillary's speech here: youtu.be/r3B1cMe_DFI

comment.author: Brandan
comment.text: She sounds so disingenuous. It's like a high school drama student's monologue.

replies.author: Cole
replies.text: Disengenuous, really?? Have you heard trump???? Take the white hood off so that you can hear her more clearly.

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: You need to believe in her. She is passionate about her love for children, helping families, those who have hard times no matter their race, religion etc. she is compassionate, caring and willing to work beyond the call, unselfishly. Bravo Hillary.
